post.body: prayers being sent right now...
I'm reflecting 2. Let's compare notes over a beer this week...
u remind me so much of jo kitty when she was a kitten. Tell ur mom getting a 2nd cat as a polaymate helped!
shamrock half is march 22 in virginia beach.
true about the holidays. The blues just took me by surprise.
merry christmas tray.
u have a kitty? Oh good for u!
don't tease about cookies. I will be right over.
what about cookies? Mom makes the best xms cookies...haven't had one. Yet
Going 2 bed early. And not coming out until spring.
going to Susan's parents house for dinner. first time meeting her dad. second time meeting her mom. there will be ham. and cards. I'm sure.
curled up w the kitties for the nite.
rain? what?
just finished breakfast w my girl. its nice for both of us 2 be home at the same time
my 1.5 yr old nephew has his toel nails painted. and hes carrying his sis' princess wand around. awesome.
i dont feel well. cant explain it. just emotionally out of whack.
christmas dinner is almost served. then a sacred trip to the casino.
napping. Except my nephews are chasing each other around the room. Who gave them all those sugar cookies?
about to make breakfast for entire family. lets hope for the best :)
Having a very bacardi christmas
